title: Lucid Said It Will Raise Up to $1.5 Billion in Capital
description: The electric carmaker made the announcement on the same day it reported losing $670 million in the third quarter.
dc:creator: Neal E. Boudette
media:credit: Bryan Derballa for The New York Times
media:description: Lucid Group said it lost $670 million in the third quarter while significantly increasing production of its Air sedan.
